effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Manacles of the Nightmare Colossus

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Disintegrate damage increased by 6% and Pyre damage increased by 6%.
(4) Set: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star's cooldowns are decreased by 1.0 sec and Eternity Surge now grants Essence Burst.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gauntlets of the Demented Mind

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Sever your bond at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Equip: Carefully balance the Egg's incubation. While stationary, gain 188 Intellect every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while moving. While moving, gain 164 of your highest secondary stat every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while stationary. 

Additional stacks above 20 grant 60% reduced benefit.
Use: Suspend the Egg's incubation state for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 119,018 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
